title: Motivating Kids to Reflect the Character of God, Part 5
itunes:author: John Fuller & Danny Huerta
itunes:summary:
John and Danny discuss how sometimes we have to allow our children go through some pain and struggle to help them grow strong.

Receive Kathy Koch's book Start With the Heart with your gift of any amount!
